Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Cationic peptide that possess multiple functions. It acts as a cell-penetrating peptide (CPP), and as a potent voltage- gated potassium channel (Kv) inhibitor. It exhibits antimicrobial activities, and hind limb paralysis (By similarity). It also induces potent blockade of neuromuscular transmission in young chicken biventer cervicis preparation and potent myotoxic effect. In mice, it induces myonecrosis, upon intramuscular or subcutaneous injections.
Sequence Information.Toxic Dose: LD(50) is 0.07 mg/kg by subcutaneous injection.

Literature.Title: Structural and biological characterization of two crotamine isoformsIV-2 and IV-3 isolated from the Crotalus durissus cumanensis venom.
Literature.Author: Ponce-Soto LA, Martins-de-Souza D, Novello JC, Marangoni S.
